description:
The svalbard wool t-shirt is a lightweight yet durable t-shirt with a regular fit. It can be worn alone or as a layer

The svalbard wool t-shirt is a lightweight yet durable t-shirt with a regular fit.

It can be worn alone or as a layer and is available in three different graphic motifs.

A cool extra is the glass cleaning cloth on the inside of the hem, which you can use to clean the even cooler sunglasses.

With its odor-resistant properties, it is the first choice for longer hikes.
name: Norrona Svalbard Wool T-Shirt - Mens
